properties.name: Acme
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin 1305 SE 8th Portland OR 97214 laid back wrap around bar. never had the food but good beer. live music, film nights, smoking ok and outdoor seating. check out the bathroom art

properties.name: Billy Ray's Neighborhood Dive
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin  2216 NE MLK Blvd Portland OR 97212 billy\'s is stumbling distance to my house. they have cheap beer, pool, pinball and sometimes ping pong. pretty mixed crowd, no liquor, nice roomy upstairs.

properties.name: Crystal Ballroom
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin 1332 W. Burnside portland, ori saw the arcade fire here and they marched out onto burnside and played for 20 minutes or so. there were so many people it stopped trafic going both ways. wow! the ball room has bad sound, a bouncy floor and over priced drinks and beer

properties.name: Dante's
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin 1 SW Third Ave portland, orpricey drinks, descent sound for a small club, pizza slices on the late night, no pbr

properties.name: Dino's Inn
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin  1008 SE Hawthorne portland, or 97214divey hole the wall. they recently hosted tony trujillo(anithero pro) and jake phelps (of thrasher magazine) band, after the krooked movie premiere. madness ensued. strippers are ok depending on the night.

properties.name: Doug Fir Lounge
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin  830 E. Burnside Portland, OR 97214jetsons meets twin peaks. great music venue. smoking outside only :( really stuck up staff, ok food, super cool design by skylab

properties.name: Gainesville, FL
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwingainesville, fli spent about a semester of my junior year in highschool here. i saw the flaming lips on their "hit to death in the future head" tour

properties.name: Kellys Olympian
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin  426 sw washington portland, or3rd oldest bar in porltand. stiff drinks, decent food. cool decor makes you feel like your in a las vegas motorcycle garage. big flat screens usually with skating on. ask for a black and blue

properties.name: Loco Locos Burritos
properties.description: Posted by DeisnorStreet Food

properties.name: Mary's Club
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin  129 SW Broadway Porltand, OR 97205smoke filled, greasy, dive of all strip clubs. good food provided by el grillo adds to the flavor of Portlands first strip club. you cant live or visit here and not go into mary\'s at least once.

properties.name: Portland, OR
properties.description: Posted by KaptinqwinPortland, ORcity of roses, strip clubs, crack, coffee, beer, rain and music. god i love this city.

properties.name: Santa Cruz
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin Santa Cruz, CAcity of surfers, skaters, hippies, punks and dykes. imortalized in the movie The Lost Boys. taqueria paradise. this is where i grew up.

properties.name: Shanghai Tunnel
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin  211 Sw Ankeny St, Portland, ORpeanut noodle bowls here with fried tofu are amazing (im not even veggie) good drinks, great outdoor seating and a dark underground bar area, good for hiding out. pinball, new pool table. i likes the shanhai!

properties.name: Slow Bar
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin  533 SE Grand Ave. Portland OR 97214 the slow burger is one of the best burgers in town, other food is excellent as well. super cool decor, pretty mixed crowd leaning toward punks and hipsters. smoke ok and hardcore tunes.

properties.name: The Blazer Girls
properties.description: Posted by KaptinqwinOne Center Court; Portland, OR 97227These honeys wanted me so bad but i just played it cool like i always do.

properties.name: The Del Mar Theatre
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin 1124 pacific ave santa cruz,cai saw "gleaming the cube" here when i was in 7th or 8th grade. it was closed for a while but has now been renovated and revamped

properties.name: The Good Foot
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin  2845 SE Stark St. Portland, OR 97214pinball, pool, art, music downstairs, good beer and alcohol. i strongly recommend the chicken strips and the salmon burger. watch out for pinball gangs!

properties.name: The Hungry Tiger
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin 2800 E Burnside St Portland OR 97214 dank, smokey, and divey as dives can be. stiff drinks, cold bartenders, old drunks, punks, and all in between. a good place to get shit faced and get over the girl that broke your heart. ask the salty dogs for advice.

properties.name: The Whole Enchilada
properties.description: Posted by KaptinqwinMoss Landing Road moss landing ,cagreat upscale mexican. i went recently with my family. the mojitos are fantastic and you have to try the deep fried castroville artichokes

properties.name: Towne Lounge
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin 714 sw 20th pl. portland, orsmall off shoot of the matador. good spot for indie shows (black bird presents) stiff drinks, havent had the food. small venue=sold out shows.

properties.name: Wonder Ballroom
properties.description: Posted by Kaptinqwin 128 Ne Russell St, Portland, ORive seen mogwai, the animal collective and black heart procession here. nice venue, drinks are pricey, sound is good. most shows are all ages :( ps pics are of the bands and of the mogwai bus...
